text: Bartosz Konopko (born 6 June 1988) is a Polish short track speed skater. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male short track speed skaters Category:Olympic short track speed skaters of Poland Category:Short track speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Białystok
title: Bartosz Konopko
